alert.note: Alert for Carlton; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 16 at 3:23PM CST until December 16 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Northwestern Pine County in east central Minnesota... Western Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 415 PM CST. * At 321 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Kettle River, or 26 miles southwest of Cloquet, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility of one quarter of a mile or less in heavy snow. This includes Interstate 35 from near Barnum, to Moose Lake to Sandstone. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions. Locations impacted include... Sandstone, Mahtowa, Barnum, Willow River, Askov, Cromwell, Rutledge, Kettle River, Bruno, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Sturgeon Lake, Finlayson, Denham, Grindstone Lake Pine County, Moose Lake State Park, Sawyer, Banning State Park, Kettle Lake, and Friesland. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution, slow down and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Do not use cruise control in winter driving conditions.
